name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Label Sharing for Gmail™ by cloudHQ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Email and label sharing plus real-time team collaboration and chat without ever leaving Gmail™
short.de: Email- und Etikettenfreigabe sowie Echtzeit-Teamzusammenarbeit und Chat, ohne jemals Gmail™ zu verlassen.
short.es: Compartir correos electrónicos y etiquetas, además de colaboración en equipo en tiempo real y chat sin salir nunca de Gmail™
short.fr: Partage d'e-mails et d'étiquettes, plus collaboration d'équipe en temps réel et chat sans jamais quitter Gmail™
short.it: Condivisione di email ed etichette, oltre a collaborazione di squadra in tempo reale e chat senza mai lasciare Gmail™
short.ja: Gmail™を一度も離れることなく、メールとラベルの共有、リアルタイムのチームコラボレーションとチャット。
short.nl: E-mail en label delen, plus real-time team samenwerking en chatten zonder ooit Gmail™ te verlaten
short.pl: Udostępnianie e-maili i etykiet, a także współpraca zespołowa w czasie rzeczywistym i czat bez konieczności opuszczania Gmail™
short.pt_BR: Compartilhamento de e-mails e etiquetas, além de colaboração em equipe em tempo real e chat sem nunca sair do Gmail™
short.pt_PT: Partilha de e-mails e etiquetas, mais colaboração de equipa em tempo real e chat sem nunca sair do Gmail™
short.zh_CN: 在不离开Gmail™的情况下进行电子邮件和标签共享，以及实时团队协作和聊天。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
FREE! Share Gmail™ labels (and emails) as you would share folders in Google Drive™.  

This extension allows you to use your Gmail™ as a collaboration tool, without ever having to leave your email screen.  Its an amazingly simple way to way to share labels with projects / cases, assign tasks, and track status of hiring process, support and sales queries.

This is ideal for: 

- Customer service and support
- Sales teams
- Legal teams
- Hiring / Recruitment
- Anyone who wants to share an entire Gmail label with someone else

Here's how to use this extension:
1) Install the extension and create a cloudHQ account.
2) Choose the label you want to share.
3) Send an invitation.

For best practices and real-world examples of how law and real estate firms use our product, please refer to these support notes:
https://support.cloudhq.net/best-practice-how-real-estate-firms-use-save-emails-to-google-drive/
https://support.cloudhq.net/organizing-workflow-in-law-firms-with-cloudhq-save-emails-to-google-drive/

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.

cloudHQ website: https://www.cloudhq.net/share
App website: https://www.gmail-label-sharing.com/
Pricing: https://www.gmail-label-sharing.com/pricing
Support page: https://support.cloudhq.net/category/browser-extensions/gmail-label-and-email-sharing/
Blog: https://blog.cloudhq.net

Gmail, Google Shared Drive, Google Drive, and Google Workspace are trademarks of Google LLC. Use of these trademarks is subject to Google Permissions.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,zh_CN:
FREE! Share Gmail labels (and emails) as you would share folders in Google Drive.  

This is ideal for: 

- Customer service and support
- Sales teams
- Legal teams
- Hiring / Recruitment
- Anyone who wants to share an entire Gmail label with someone else

cloudHQ™ allows you to use your Gmail™ as a collaboration tool, without ever having to leave your email screen.  Its an amazingly simple way to way to share emails and attachments, assign tasks, and track status of hiring process, support and sales queries.

To see what other free Chrome extension services we offer, please visit: https://cloudHQ.net/chrome_extensions
